item.description: To celebrate National Poetry Month, poets published by WordTech Communications will offer a poetry feast. The poets will recite poems ranging from themes of love and wisdom to gardening.Â  WordTech Communications LLC is one of the nation's largest poetry publishers, bringing out approximately 50 titles per year by established and emerging poets.
